ARABIC: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ ٱجْهَرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Whether you keep your words secret or say them out loud He knows what the heart contains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Whether you say a thing secretly or openly, He knows the innermost secrets of your hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Whether you speak in secrecy or aloud, (it is all the same to Allah). He even knows the secrets that lie hidden in the breasts of people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Whether you conceal what you say or reveal it, God knows best all that the hearts contain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And whether you speak softly or proclaim it aloud; He indeed knows what lies within the hearts!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And whether you keep your talk secret or disclose it, verily, He is the All-Knower of what is in the breasts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And conceal your word or manifest it; surely He is Cognizant of what is in the hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Be secret in your speech, or proclaim it, He knows the thoughts within the breasts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And keep your opinion secret or proclaim it, lo! He is Knower of all that is in the breasts (of men).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Whether you speak in secret or aloud, He knows what is in every heart.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And whather ye keep your discourse secret or publish it, verily He is the Knower of that which is in the breasts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Speak secretly, or do so openly, indeed He knows well what is in the breasts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And whether ye hide your word or publish it, He certainly has (full) knowledge, of the secrets of (all) hearts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And whether you keep your talk secret or disclose it, verily, He is the All-Knower of what is in the breasts (of men).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (Whether you) speak in secret or aloud, He knows the innermost of the chests.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Whether you keep your words secret, or declare them—He is Aware of the inner thoughts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And conceal your speech or publicize it; indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [67:13]   And [whether you] keep secret, O people, your speech or proclaim it, He indeed, exalted be He, is Knower of what is in the breasts, of what they contain: so how much more so [is He Knower] in the case of what you utter [openly] — the reason for the revelation of this [verse] was that the idolaters said to one another: ‘Speak secretly, and Muhammad’s god will not hear you’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And keep your opinion secret) about Muhammad (pbuh) through your treachery and betrayal (or proclaim it) through war and fighting, (lo! He is Knower of all that is in the breasts (of men)) He is the Knower of what is in people's hearts of good and evil.
